mapper.sql: id, user_id, default_id, del_flag, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select d.id, d.user_id, d.default_id, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.update_by, d.create_time, d.update_time, u.realname as userName from default_user d left join sys_user u on d.default_id = u.id where d.del_flag = 0 and u.del_flag = 0 and d.user_id = #{userId}
